item.title: HTML Entities
item.description:
This list of html entities is for reference and testing of entity handling. Name Character HTML (quilt shortcut) Unicode hex (decimal) Description
quot " " \x0022 (34) quotation mark (APL quote)
amp & & \x0026 (38) ampersand
apos

item.title: \(\LaTeX\) Support
item.description: A list of MathJax \(\LaTeX\) Command examples. These alphabetical examples come from here. There are a lot of examples so the page may take a while to render.

item.title: Quilt's Markdown Syntax
item.description: Quilt uses Python-Markdown as it's markdown interpreter. Besides the base syntax rules of original Markdown, quilt parses extra markdown syntax. Extras includes abbreviations, attribute lists, definitions, fenced code, footnotes, tables (with escape

item.title: Quilt: A python based static site html stitcher.
item.description: A python based static site html stitcher. Description Generate a static site via python from content-only .html and .md pages that are stitched together along with patch (e.g. nav.html, footer.html) files onto a main site quilt.html file.

item.title: Page Variable Change
item.description:
The syntax for page variable headers changed from json to key: value plaintext. The method follows MultiMarkdown's metadata
key [A-Za-z0-9_-]+ from beginning of line until : value a string per line, where multiline values become arrays notes key:
